title: Chat service?
body: I log into the game, and it just says logging into chat service, then I tried getting into a game, and it just refused to connect me to the game, is anyone else having this trouble?

replies.body: There aren't any issues with our  servers that I can see.  Your network might be having problems staying connected, so try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  That should help resolve whatever is blocking that connection to chat with others or get in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
